movies.title: Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde
movies.plot: A Turkish comedy film directed by Murat Aslan about an incompetent gang of criminals attempting the biggest robbery of their careers,which was one of the highest-grossing Turkish film of 2005.
movies.simplePlot: A Turkish comedy film directed by Murat Aslan about an incompetent gang of criminals attempting the biggest robbery of their careers,which was one of the highest-grossing Turkish film of 2005.

biography.bio: Memet Ali Alabora was born on November 25, 1977 in Istanbul, Turkey as Memet Ali. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Eve Dönüs (2006), 7 maris pour Hürmüz (2009) and The Chaos Class in the Military (2005). He has been married to Pinar Ögün since November 19, 2009.
biography.name: Memet Ali Alabora

biography.bio: Peker Açikalin is an actor, known for Maskeli Besler: Irak (2007), Americans at the Black Sea (2007) and Türkler Cildirmis Olmali (2009). He was previously married to Melek Taskin, Ünsal, Niran and Nilüfer Açikalin.
biography.name: Peker Açikalin

biography.bio: Nejat Birecik is an actor, known for The Chaos Class in the Military (2005), Evvel zaman hikayesi (2011) and Alacakaranlik (2003).
biography.name: Nejat Birecik

biography.bio: Guzin Coragan was born in 1943. She is an actress, known for Selamsiz's Band (1987), Düttürü Dünya (1988) and Milyarder (1986).
biography.name: Guzin Coragan

biography.bio: Melih Ekener was born on June 13, 1965 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Maskeli Besler: Irak (2007), The Chaos Class in the Military (2005) and Yalanci romantik (2008).
biography.name: Melih Ekener

biography.bio: Dost Elver was born in 1972 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Yes Sir (2007), Robbery Alla Turca (2005) and Muhalif baskan (2013).
biography.name: Dost Elver

biography.bio: Mehmet Ali Erbil was born on February 8, 1957 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is known for his work on Keloglan vs. the Black Prince (2006), Yes Sir (2007) and Kahpe Bizans (1999). He has been married to Tugba Coskun since April 30, 2005. They have one child. He was previously married to Sedef Altuntas, Nergis Kumbasar and Muhsine Sehnaz Kamiloglu.
biography.name: Mehmet Ali Erbil

biography.bio: Hamit Haskabal was an actor, known for Sakar Sakir (1977), The Chaos Class in the Military (2005) and Maskeli Besler: Irak (2007). He died on January 3, 2012 in Istanbul, Turkey.
biography.name: Hamit Haskabal

biography.bio: Zeynep Karacan is an actress, known for The Class of Chaos 3,5 (2005), Oglum için (2007) and Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde (2005).
biography.name: Zeynep Karacan

biography.bio: Ali Karagöz was born in 1960 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Hapishane gülü (1986), Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde (2005) and Yeni hayat (2001).
biography.name: Ali Karagöz

biography.bio: Cengiz Küçükayvaz was born on July 30, 1968 in Usak, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Yes Sir (2007), Azize: Bir Laleli Hikayesi (1999) and Maskeli Besler: Irak (2007).
biography.name: Cengiz Küçükayvaz

biography.bio: Deniz Oral was born in 1963 in Mersin, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Everything's Gonna Be Great (1998), Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde (2005) and Yasar ne yasar ne yasamaz (2008).
biography.name: Deniz Oral

biography.bio: Safak Sezer was born on October 10, 1970 in Ankara, Turkey. He is an actor and writer, known for G.O.R.A. (2004), Kolpaçino (2009) and Kolpaçino: Bomba (2011).
biography.name: Safak Sezer

biography.bio: Evrim Solmaz was born on August 27, 1972 in Ankara, Turkey. She is an actress, known for Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde (2005), Shattered Soul (2006) and Dirilis: Ertugrul (2014).
biography.name: Evrim Solmaz

biography.bio: Sümer Tilmaç was born on July 15, 1948 in Malatya, Turkey. He was an actor and director, known for Gönül yarasi, blessures du coeur (2005), Süper Baba (1993) and The Ottoman Republic (2008). He was married to Hatice Melek. He died on June 12, 2015 in Istanbul, Turkey.
biography.name: Sümer Tilmaç
